acrossClues.clue: Everything of life will accept its kind as its _.

No one can enslave another who has equal what?
There are several civilizations. We have a ­­­­­­wicked one and a ___ one.
Can God be a Mystery and yet send who to represent Himself?
We must become aware of the knowledge of this and the time in which we are living.

downClues.clue: What question has now been answered from the mouth of Allah to us? Who is the ___ man?
This is the mans field to produce a nation.
In Referring to the Father, the Son and the Holy Ghost being three that has been made one, he says that this is contrary to both nature and what?
Will a free people accept slaves as their ___?
Allah is here to give you and me a superior knowledge of things and a ___ to ourselves.
You must know that you have not been rightly civilized.

labels.clear_dialog_text: Do you really want to clear the board?
labels.description: This is a modern crossword game with HTML5 canvas and material design elements.
labels.help_text: Fill in the correct answers, one letter per square, both across and down, from the given clues. You can reveal a letter or word when you are stuck.
